src:
黄重坤が逆転優勝…ゴルフ・マイナビＡＢＣ

03 Nov 2019, 07:36

　男子ゴルフのマイナビＡＢＣ選手権（７２００ヤード、パー７２）最終日は３日、兵庫ＡＢＣＧＣで行われ、２位で出た黄重坤（ハンジュンゴン）（２７）（韓国）が通算１９アンダーで、２０１５年カシオワールドオープン以来となるツアー通算４勝目を挙げた。１打差の２位に今平周吾、１６アンダーの３位に小平智が入った。
text:
Huang Shigeo wins the championship ... Golf Mynavi ABC

03 Nov 2019, 07:36

The last day of the Men's Golf My Navi ABC Championship (7200 yards, par 72) was held at Hyogo ABCGC on the 3rd, and Hanjun Gong (27) (Korea), who came in 2nd place, was 19 under, 2015 Casio This is the fourth tournament win since the World Open. Shuhei Imahira entered the second place with one stroke difference, and Satoshi Kodaira entered the third place with 16 under.
